title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Meet the Press host Chuck Todd claims outrage over Critical Race Theory is "manufactured". Critical race theory is an attack on America, attempt to divide us. Chart of what is considered white supremacy according to what they're teaching in Iowa. Clay's poll results: 90% think Herschel Walker should run for Senate. Buck's Dr. Fauci impression. Callers on CRT. 90-year-old WWII vet jumps out of plane.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
